about.description:
**Conda-forge notes:** If you are using this in a conda package and  PyPI is the source URL,
it is possible that this plugin is not correctly setting the versions.

In order to override the plugin and fix the behaviour,
add the following to your `build:` section:

```yml
script_env:
  - POETRY_DYNAMIC_VERSIONING_BYPASS=0.4.0
```

This will pull in the version defined in your meta.yml.
about.summary: Plugin for Poetry to enable dynamic versioning based on VCS tags

about.description:
**Conda-forge notes:** If you are using this in a conda package and  PyPI is the source URL,
it is possible that this plugin is not correctly setting the versions.

In order to override the plugin and fix the behaviour,
add the following to your `build:` section:

```yml
script_env:
  - POETRY_DYNAMIC_VERSIONING_BYPASS=0.4.0
```

This will pull in the version defined in your meta.yml.
about.summary: Plugin for Poetry to enable dynamic versioning based on VCS tags

name: poetry-dynamic-versioning-plugin
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "poetry-dynamic-versioning-plugin" %}
{% set version = "0.4.0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/poetry-dynamic-versioning-plugin-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 9d6b22973e79f499a7a9a2e22af479b24e9d6bc614a1cf3344cb0f3847fc3063

build:
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv
  number: 1

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - poetry-core >=1.0.0
    - python >=3.7
  run:
    - dunamai >=1.12.0,<2.0.0
    - jinja2 >=2.11.1,<4
    - poetry >=1.2.0,<2.0.0
    - python >=3.7
    - tomlkit >=0.4

test:
  imports:
    - poetry_dynamic_versioning
  commands:
    - pip check
  requires:
    - pip

about:
  home: https://github.com/mtkennerly/poetry-dynamic-versioning
  summary: Plugin for Poetry to enable dynamic versioning based on VCS tags
  license: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  description: |
    **Conda-forge notes:** If you are using this in a conda package and  PyPI is the source URL,
    it is possible that this plugin is not correctly setting the versions.
    
    In order to override the plugin and fix the behaviour,
    add the following to your `build:` section:

    ```yml
    script_env:
      - POETRY_DYNAMIC_VERSIONING_BYPASS={{ version }}
    ```

    This will pull in the version defined in your meta.yml.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - BastianZim
